title: The Best-est Party Looks of the Week
text:
Photo: Getty Images, Farfetch.com

This week Flaviana Matata turned her pre–Labor Day all-white ensemble into an edgy outfit with structured sunnies, while Jada Pinkett Smith reminded us that the time for layers is nearly upon us. Cara Delevingne quelled our fears with her hypnotizing frock, and brought back memories of when we took acid in college (who me?). Chrissy Metz looked like a glamorous 1940s femme fatale, while Tamzin Merchant was inspired by this girl’s wine-fueled resourcefulness. Who wore the best look? Scroll to see everyone below.

Most Likely to Wear White After Labor Day: Flaviana Matata

Photo: Mark Sagliocco/Getty Images for Burnett New Yor

At the Brunch for Burnett New York in Sag Harbor.

Best Late-Summer Coat: Jada Pinkett Smith

Photo: Jon Kopaloff/Getty Images

At the Angel Has Fallen premiere at the Beverly Wilshire Four Seasons Hotel in Los Angeles.

Most Hallucinogenic: Cara Delevigne

Photo: Phillip Faraone/Getty Images

At the L.A. premiere of Amazon’s Carnival Row.

Most Likely to Put Poison in Your Dirty Martini: Chrissy Metz

Photo: Rich Fury/Getty Images

At the Gay Men’s Chorus of Los Angeles 40th Anniversary Gala.

Best High-Fashion Wine Stain: Tamzin Merchant

Photo: Phillip Faraone/Getty Images

At the L.A. premiere of Amazon’s Carnival Row.

Most Likely to Watch the Clueless Reboot: Justine Skye

Photo: Sansho Scott/BFA.com

At her album release party in Soho.

The Look We Wish We Could Buy: Elyse Levesque

Photo: Jon Kopaloff/Getty Images,

At the L.A. screening of Ready or Not.

Best Mock Mondrian: Angela Simmons

Photo: MIKE COPPOLA/Getty Images

At the season premiere of Power in New York.

Most Reminiscent of Daphne Guinness: Johnny Luxo

Photo: Mauricio Santana/Getty Images

At the Balmain party in São Paulo, Brazil.

Most Elegant Use of Hair Clips: Ciara

Photo: Astrid Stawiarz/Getty Images

At Black Girls Rock in New Jersey.

Best Western: Winnie Harlow

Photo: Monica Schipper/Getty Images

At the Republic Records VMA after-party in New York City.

Most Likely Stealing Your Man: Cardi B

Photo: Matt Winkelmeyer/Getty Images

At the Hustlers premiere in Beverly Hills.

Sexiest Bike Shorts: Casey Boonstra

Photo: Jon Kopaloff/Getty Images

At the It: Chapter Two premiere in California.

Most Enviable Hair: Nathalie Emmanuel

Photo: Getty Images

At the screening of Netflix’s The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance in New York City.
description: This week’s best party pics feature Cara Delevigne, Jada Pinkett Smith, and Chrissy Metz. Who wore the best look?
